alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 8:09PM CDT until June 15 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Dale County in southeastern Alabama... Coffee County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 809 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ozark, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Daleville, Elba, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, Ozark, Level Plains, Newton, New Brockton, Ariton, Pinckard, Lee, Kinston, Mixons Crossroads, Hunt Field, Waterford, Curtis, Carl Folsom A/p, Hooper Stage Field, Gerald and Camp Humming Hills. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
